about.engagement: More than just a butcher shop, we are a place of trust, where people come as much for the exceptional quality of our products as to share our passion for meat.
about.intro: Boucherie Vaz was born in 2025 with a clear idea: quality above all. Every meat we offer is the result of artisanal know-how and selected with high standards.
about.promiseText: Located in the heart of the butchery tradition, our shop is your new gourmet address in Vallorbe. We select our meats with the greatest care to guarantee freshness, taste, and tenderness.
